duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide systems engineering assistance in the acquisition process, including new and legacy systems, modifications, upgrades, and worldwide support.
Design, plan, execute, and document test and evaluation programs, including test planning and test resource management.
Review and ensure accuracy of engineering-related documents, participate in system architecture development, and provide technical evaluation of contractor proposals.
Support the development of technical plans, tracking status of risk and issue resolution, and participating in special studies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in a professional engineering discipline from an ABET-accredited educational program OR Master's Degree in a professional engineering discipline from an ABET-accredited educational program
